transcript:
Customer: Waheguru Waheguru Waheguru
Executive: Hello, haanji madam.
Customer: Haanji, Gaurav sir, Sandhya bol rahi thi IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haanji, haanji, haanji.
Executive: Aapka problem solve hua aapka?
Customer: Haan, aap solve hua hai, ab main dekh raha hu, wahi maine kai baar try kiya hai, ab sahi chal raha hai ye ab chahe iski chatting us pe usi time aa jati hai.
Executive: Haanji. Thik hai.
Executive: Aur aapka koi email wagera bhi maine yaha se check kara liya hai, koi aapka email wagera block nahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Wo I think wo kuch problem mail to wahi aata hai ki
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aapka koi bhi email block nahi hai IndiaMART se, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: To wo kuch technical problem hoga jiski wajah se ye aapke paas chala gaya hoga but aisa kuch hai nahi abhi filhaal.
Customer: Thik hai mam, thank you.
Executive: Thik hai. Aur abhi main aapka concern close kar du sir?
Customer: Thik hai mam aap kar do.
Executive: Thik hai. And sir aapse humble request hai, kuch bhi problem aaye sir aap please mujhe ya Rajat ko WhatsApp kar dena, main usko kar lungi. Because baar baar aapka matlab concern raise hota hai na to mere liye bahut bada problem ho gaya abhi.
Customer: Nahi nahi, thik hai.
Executive: Ki matlab main customer mam aap ye dekhiye na ki mujhe ab aap dekhiye mere paas aaj six lead sari available hai.
Customer: Sir wo to ek do din agar aap matlab technical problem ki wajah se to ho jata hai.
Customer: Are maine maine kal parso abhi Rudarpur ka bhi ek liya hai, wo customer ne lead dali hui thi system pe, maine uski lead le li aur main call kar kar ke thak gaya hu call nahi utha raha hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aap check kariye system pe Rudarpur ka customer batao batao mujhe batao meri mujhe
Customer: Nahi meri jo limited leads hoti hai wo to sari waste ho jati hai na.
Executive: I understood sir but sir 100% maine aapko dekho pehle bhi bataya tha 100% lead relevant nahi hoti hai. Aap kisi bhi portal pe aap enroll karoge na 100% lead relevant nahi aayegi aapko.
Customer: Madam agar wo aap ye dekhiye na aap mujhe agar call kar rahe hai kisi bhi kaam ke liye agar main call hi na uthau to wo acha rahega?
Executive: Agar mujhe aap se product lena hai agar aap se mujhe plan lena hai to thik hai nahi lena to tab bhi main agar phone hi na uthau aapko haa na ka jawab hi na du.
Executive: I understand sir but wo har ek customer ka thought alag hota hai sir hum
Customer: Abhi abhi abhi jo abhi jo do teen do teen din se to maine wo ikatthe kar rakhe the maine tabhi to Rajat ji ko bheje aur tabhi maine mail kara usko.
Executive: Chaliye thik hai sir no problem wo main ek bar wo to hum aapka work kar hi rahe hai. But initial level pe sir aapka koi bhi problem aayega to please request hai aap please mujhe ya Rajat ko WhatsApp karna hum aapko call kar lenge. But aap customer care pe please call ya mail mat daliyega abhi request hai aapse.
Customer: Thik hai mam, thik hai mam, thank you.
Executive: Thik hai main aapka concern close kar rahi hu koi bhi aapke paas ek feedback mil jayega satisfied ho to aap yes kar dena.
Customer: Thik hai mam.
Executive: Thik hai, thank you so much sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's email was not receiving buyleads.

- Customer received a lead but not responding.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed email is not blocked.

- Explained that not all leads are relevant.

- Requested to contact her or Rajat directly.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the concern.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, technical issue, email, customer care
